@robszumski "builds and stores containers for folks deploying them" OK, that helps. Thanks. @quayio
@quayio sorry to be so dense. Searching for Docker container hosting (analogous to LAMP shared hosting), found Quay, couldn't comprehend it.
@quayio Pls describe Quay like "for <person> who <description>, Quay is a <product>. Unlike <competition>, Quay is <differentiation>"
@quayio If I have a web server packaged in a Docker container, is Quay.io where I host that container for production use by customers?
@quayio I'm trying to figure out what you do, & your site's explanation assumes knowledge I don't have. What is a "Docker Registry"?
